title: Lori Lightfoot's Election in Chicago & Trump's Ongoing Beef with Windmills | PJ Morton
itunes:title: Lori Lightfoot's Election in Chicago & Trump's Ongoing Beef with Windmills | PJ Morton
description:
Lori Lightfoot becomes Chicago's first black female mayor, Trevor examines President Trump's war against windmills, and PJ Morton discusses his album "Gumbo Unplugged."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
